intro: Psychotria holtzii, commonly known as the Hawaiian psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often in forest understories. Psychotria holtzii is also notable for its role in the traditional culture and ecological systems of Hawaii.
